responses.title: My beasts and I hunt our prey.
You should pray. You are prey.
You've got to bite to eat.
Nature, red in tooth and talon.
It's the nature of the beast.
I free the beast in me.
A death not fit for man...or beast.
I die feral, as I lived.
This will come back to bite you.
Bit off more than I could…chew.
My bite is worse than my bark.
Again, I sink my teeth into life.
Hmm, wish I'd learned how to read.
I like to travel light, but I'll make an exception.
Even eagle eyes couldn't see me.

responses.title: The dogs of war feast tonight!
I'll be creeping while you are sleeping.
I run with the rabbit and hunt with the hounds.
It's not the size of the beast in the fight but…well, actually, size kind of helps.
